content.rendered:
Our Technology

We strongly believe that eye care, to be truly effective, is all about harnessing state-of-the-art technology to be operated by the deft hands of experts.

Our commitment to make use of the latest technology has made technology acquisition and upgradation a continuous process.

Advanced Equipments

  • The AUROLASE laser from AUROLAB, Green lasers for retinal treatment
  • WAVELIGHT 500 LASER FROM ALCON for precise LASIK
  • Advanced phacoemulsification system– for Microincision Cataract Surgery
  • HUVITZ OCT [ for glaucoma , macula and anterior segment]
  • Vitrectomy machine for Vitreoretinal Surgery
  • Specialized microscopes from for intraocular, vitreoretinal and oculoplastic surgeries
  • Endoscopy for endonasal procedures
  • Laser DCR
  • Latest anesthesia work-station for personalized anesthetic care
  • Laryngeal mask anesthesia for children with immediate recovery
  • Corneal Collagen Crosslinking for Keratoconus
  • Oculus Pentacam
  • Anterior epithelial mapping
  • Digital Fundus Camera
  • Appasamy perimetry [Field Analyzer ] for glaucoma
  • Yag Laser System
  • Slit Lamps
  • Auto Refractometers
  • Digital vision charts
  • Binocularity [TNO chart] and 3D vision testing system
  • Prisms for orthoptic evaluation
  • Paediatric vision testing on HOTV charts and Cardiff cards
  • Indirect & Direct ophthalmoscopes
  • Non contact tonometers
  • Ascan for lens power calculation
  • Gonioscopy
  • Pachymetry
  • Synoptophore
  • Lensometer
